Visit

## Hours

The museum galleries are open to the public **Wednesday-Sunday, 10-4** , with the following exceptions:

  * CLOSED on January 1, July 4, Thanksgiving Day, and December 25
  * CLOSED for occasional exhibition changeovers and private events (see below)
  * OPEN on the following Monday holidays: Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Presidents Day*, Memorial Day, Labor Day, and Indigenous Peoples’ Day
  * *CLOSED Presidents Day – February 16, 2026

## Special Closures

  * CLOSED to install new exhibitions February 16-19, 2026
  * CLOSED to install new exhibitions March 7-20, 2026

## Admission

Admission is Pay As You Wish. Welcome!

## Accessibility

We are committed to making our galleries welcoming and accessible to all visitors. BMAC is wheelchair-accessible, and a guest wheelchair is available. Upon request and with advance notice, we will be glad to provide an ASL interpreter. For accessibility questions and requests, please contact Sarah Weiler at office@brattleboromuseum.org or 802-257-0124 x101. For more detailed accessibility information and what to expect during your visit, see our [Know Before You Go](https://www.brattleboromuseum.org/2026/01/09/know-before-you-go/) page.

## Docent Tours, Group Visits & Field Trips

BMAC’s friendly and knowledgeable staff look forward to welcoming you to the museum. [Click here for more information.](https://www.brattleboromuseum.org/education/guided-tours-group-visits/)
